name: You Are Dead (Marian Pekár)
description:
Point & click adventure with a dead guy, a witch, spells, magical statues, and skulls... a lot of skulls.

Source code @ GitHub

Made for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022

3D Assets by Quaternius
